segments.text: Could we have the honor of you presence of the meeting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm awfully sorry , I have other plan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you prefer some other time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to come other time if it can be arranged .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you quite sure you can come next Tuesday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time am I supposed to pick you up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll be waiting for you in our office about nine o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2
